short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you need a quick escape from some boring stuff you are doing, this extension helps you in doing so by providing random memes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes you need a quick escape from the boring stuff you are doing on the internet and this extension helps you in doing so by providing you random memes. I mean who will go to phone and open Reddit for watching memes when you can do it here in a single click. Enjoy!
